org.gvsig.raster.impl.provider.fusion

Class BufferListFusion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.impl.provider.fusion.BufferListFusion

  • public class BufferListFusion
extends Object
    Buffer composed by a list of buffers and its extents. The buffers are not tiles and it can be superposed among them. The number of pixel of each buffer can be different too.
